ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: This research is supported by the National Key Research and Development Program of China (2017YFA0603804). We would like to acknowledge the ‘Half a degree Additional warming, Prognosis and Projected Impacts’ core team, which is responsible for HAPPI; as well as the World Climate Research Programme’s Working Group on Coupled Modelling, which is responsible for CMIP. We thank the climate modeling groups for producing and making their model outputs available.
